mainText:
I bought my first computer while I was going to college to become a graphic designer in the mid 1990s. I looked over many machines to ponder which to buy. I looked at a PC and felt like I was all thumbs. I looked over a Mac and knew instantly what to do and discovered quickly all the magic this wondrous machine offered. 

I bought my first Mac and never looked back.

I've turned down several job offers simply because those offices worked on PC's. What creative person would dare touch a PC and truly feel they were getting the best tool to perform creatively in a creatively driven business.

Thank you Steve Jobs... Thank you for challenging the world and truly making a difference.
author: Dairen
